name: pumpkin-webapp
description: Web UI for the Pumpkin Engineer

scripts.release-app: jspm bundle src/app dist/app.js && uglifyjs dist/app.js -o dist/app.min.js && cp app.html dist/app.html && cp -R res dist
scripts.release-package.json: cp package.json dist && cp package-lock.json dist
scripts.release-legacy: cp index.html dist && cp script.js dist && cp pumpkin.css dist
scripts.release: npm install && npm run 1.clean && npm run release-app && npm run release-config.js && npm run release-rewrite-html && npm run release-package.json && npm run release-legacy

author: Andy Monis
